ygData.subject: Subject: RE: Lvl 52 song
ygData.msgSnippet: (I am 57 btw STILL) 1 - agree 2 - agree 3 - Not used so much if you are using Symphonic Sabre, (BTW I am using a Wrapped Entropy Serpent Spine - hehe I always
ygData.messageBody:
(I am 57 btw STILL)

1 - agree
2 - agree
3 - Not used so much if you are using Symphonic Sabre, (BTW I am using a
Wrapped Entropy Serpent Spine - hehe I always did like having a whip!!).
Sometimes binding here, sometimes charm still depending on where we are.
4 - agree
5 - Where did Occlusion of Sound drop Shada? I don't have this song and I
would love to get it. I often use a buff song here, usually AC buff like March
of the Wee.
6 - agree
7 - So often we have a snarer and slower, so I put Fufil's Curtailing chant
here for extra damage. I don't use one of the higher damage ones because I
like to debuff magic more. BTW in Velious the three chant tactic is often
unuseable because so many mobs are very cold resistant. It's frustrating at
times.
8 - Sometimes BBB (almost always with FCC to make sure it will stick),
sometimes an AOE (fun in DN - when we trip a spider trap we go to AOE hehe)


As for screech - I don't use it inside anymore because it is resisted so much.
Also in the new lands you can outrun something's aggro radius much more easily.
So sometimes SoT is a good getaway song - stop whatever it is in its tracks
and make a break for it. But I do try to keep chains (binding) and fear up
when we are exploring or traveling.

Oh incidently, I did use screech in DN the other night, and I outran aggro and
fired invis - and then Jaled Dar DTed me. So I wondered if somehow I aggroed
by using it (I wasn't using an illusion).

Oh and while I am rambling, I got Lullaby out to try and taunt so I could get
some defense improves - and it didn't work! *cry* I am going to try it on the
next beetle trap pop I think heh.

And a final thought - Wee and Rondo are fun 'You feel small' 'You are no
longer aroused' heh

Maravana


> 1) Selo's (changes to Invis or Lull indoors)
> 2) Cantana (never changes)
> 3) Song of Dawn (changes to Resist song #2 or chant if needed)
> 4) McVaxius Rousing Rondo (never changes)
> 5) Occlusion of Sound (changes to Resist song #1 or chant if needed)
> 6) Song of Twilight (never changes)
> 7) Largo's Absonant Binding (never changes, been using 23 chains forever
> because when i first got 51 binding i thought i remember it being a lower
> slowdown)
> 8) Screech (never changes, see below)
>
> any of the songs that are not "never changes" of course i can swap out for
> any rarely used or situational song i may need, e.g. charimsatic carillion.
> as far as #8 Appaling Screech, i really need to rethink this. i am never in
> an area anymore where this song will not be resisted by everything i sing it
> on. it used to be such a handy song, but with the fear cap i need something
> else here, any suggestions?
>
> Shada
